Uses of Interface
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources.Resource

  • Packages that use Resource 
    Package Description
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources
    Provides classes that represent different physical and logical Resource used by simulation objects such as Hosts and VMs.

    • Uses of Resource in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources

      Subinterfaces of Resource in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  FileStorage
      An interface which defines the desired functionality of a storage system in a Data Cloud that performs operations on a file system, such as file inclusion, exclusion and renaming.
      interface  ResourceManageable
      An interface to represent a physical or virtual resource (like RAM, CPU or Bandwidth) with features to manage resource capacity and allocation.
      Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources that implement Resource 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Bandwidth
      Represents the Bandwidth (BW) capacity of a PM or VM in Megabits/s.
      class  HarddriveStorage
      An implementation of a Hard Drive (HD) storage device.
      class  Ram
      Represents the RAM capacity of a PM or VM in Mebabytes.
      class  RawStorage
      A simple storage that just manages the device capacity and raw allocated (used) space.
      class  ResourceAbstract
      A class that represent simple resources such as RAM, CPU or Bandwidth, storing, for instance, its capacity and amount of free available resource.
      class  SanStorage
      SanStorage represents a Storage Area Network (SAN) composed of a set of hard disks connected in a LAN.
